headline: Scholastic (SCHL) Reports Q1 Loss, Misses Revenue Estimates
summary: Scholastic (SCHL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -3.28% and -5.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended August 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Scholastic (SCHL) Reports Q1 Loss, Misses Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Scholastic (SCHL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -3.28% and -5.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended August 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: McCormick & Company Stock: Is MKC Underperforming the Consumer Staples Sector?
summary: Although McCormick & Company has underperformed its sector peers recently, analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: McCormick & Company Stock: Is MKC Underperforming the Consumer Staples Sector?

headline: One week to go: Asahi, Heineken, Trip to feature at Just Drinks non-alcoholic beverages conference
summary: Executives from Swinkels Family Brewers, Cawston Press and Crossip will also discuss the key themes shaping the sector at the two-day event.
